Generation V.Black: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.
Generation V.White: This Pokémon appears in legends. In its tail, it has a giant generator that creates electricity.
Generation V.Black 2: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.
Generation V.White 2: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.

Generation VI.X: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

Generation VIII.Sword: When the interior part of its tail spins like a motor, Zekrom can generate many bolts of lightning to blast its surroundings. *
Generation VIII.Shield: Mythology tells us that if people lose the righteousness in their hearts, their kingdoms will be razed by Zekrom's lightning. *

Generation V.White: N's Castle or Dragonspiral Tower * ( Only one )

Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Fabled Cave (requires a Level 100 Pokémon in the player's party) ( Only one )

Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Ultra Space Wilds ( Rocky World ) ( Only one )

Generation VIII.Shield Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one )
